body.p: To his Exclency B Magoffin Gov of the Comth of Kentucky your Petitioner Pheby Race states that She was fined the sum of $17 before A Riley Justice of the Peace of Pendleton County Ky for breach of the peace commited by Whipping one Eliza Ralling She admits that She did give the said Eliza Ralling a Thrasing but the facts are theas she that is your Petitioner is 67 years old & the said Eliza Rallings is 24 years old that the said Eliza is a Woman of Louse virtue that she came to the house of your Petitioner in the month of May 1862 Drunk & used very abusive Language to wit she caled your petitioner a damed old whore & many other hard names untill she could shout it no longer when she gathered a bush & give her a basting She pray that your Hon will Remit said fine in as much as she done no more then Any Decent woman would have don under the same circumstances

B Magoffin I prosecuted the case for the Comlth vs Mrs Race & the facts as as she states in her pet & I was astonashed that the Jury fined her more then one cent I know Mrs Race
She is a Woman of Good caracture that is one of the best in the meighborhood where She lives & the other woman is no better then one of the Davis Wimen of Frankfort & I have no hisotation in saying that the fine should be Remited & in fact I advise her to put you on the subject & have it Remited for I do not think she gave her a lick amiss so I Joine in the prayrs that you Remit said fine

With Respect I Remaine yours
A G Roberts Cty Atty
